sentences.en: They came backstage afterward, cooing and toadying to him.
sentences.cn: 然后他们来到后台，对他柔声细语，拍他的马屁。

sentences.en: After the show, we were allowed to go backstage to meet the cast.
sentences.cn: 表演结束之后，我们获准到后台和演员见面。

sentences.en: The performers, in costume and makeup, were walking up and down backstage.
sentences.cn: 演员们穿着戏服化着妆，在后台走来走去。
